title: How does the ARAM ranking system work?
body:
can someone please explain how it works? 

im Jhin and go 12/6/20 and the TF is 14/4/18 i do double the damage compared to him and i only get a B while he gets an S

i dont think 2 deaths means the difference between 2 whole ranks, is it based on the champions you play? or is there a different reason

also just played a game on Nami went 4/3/36 but only got a B+ so i think healing based champs dont get a high grade
